title: Nutcat the Wise
description: Suvnin and his friend Nutcat the wise are on a picnic and the unthinkable happens. Get ready to be introduced to more delightful creatures from the Pachaihara forest and the neigbouring forest of Droom in this tale of fantasy. Experience the thrill of an unlikely alliance that is formed between two beings from two very different worlds as they plan to bring about a change that would shatter beliefs and herald a new beginning. Will they succeed?
author: A.R. Sara
